players.name: Alice
memory: The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.

Bob: "Alice, you are the mafia. I investigated you and confirmed. Vote to arrest you."
Diana: "I think Bob is the detective. Alice is mafia. Vote to arrest Alice."
